daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: New York City faces significant challenges as Attorney General James warns of price gouging amid winter storms, while nurses at twelve hospitals vote to strike, and Mayor-elect Mamdani confronts street homelessness as a pressing issue. Additionally, the state's minimum wage is set to increase on January 1.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
